text: all right good morning London how's it
going i'm Kaylin from Pipkit the
workflows company where we focus on
maintaining uh Argo workflows Argo Helm
and contribute to Argo events so I'm
excited to give the project update today
if you're new to Argo events it's the
event engine for Argo to run all sorts
of pipelines triggered by Git events S3
Kafka NATS um so definitely check it out
if you haven't already since it's one of
the the smaller Argo projects but it's
small mighty and growing and if you're
curious about it there'll be a talk
today at 11 by my teammate Darko talking
about instant remediation triggered by
Argo events so check that out i'm sure
he's he's really happy I mentioned that
um yeah we're growing so we've added a
few more dozen contributors uh a ton of
activity that drove four patch releases
since the last Argo events update um and
so we've really been focusing on keeping
uh the the project updated on the
security front fixing bugs as well as 12
new features and on the feature front
we've been improving mostly our Git
events event sources so GitLab got some
love Bitbucket got some love so if you
haven't seen or tried Argo events since
upgrading these event sources for Git um
check definitely check that out if
you're a GitLab or a Bitbucket user um
we've also added a bunch of support um
for features related to Azure Event Hub
um and then some improvements on the
NATS and Kafka fronts um that you you
probably take advantage of if you're
using those tools um and then one big
feature we also added was around the
dead letter Q trigger in the event
sensor um so overall yeah really excited
to have a lot of new contributors
contributing these features um and we
look forward to more folks contributing
if you have a new event source uh you'd
like to see added please do open an
issue on the repo and we'll be focusing
more in the future based on uh you know
community demand for for feature
requests and bug fixes so please go to
the repo and and add an upvote if you
want to see um a feature added
and with that I'll hand it to my wise
teammate Tim who's a local here to give
the Argo Helm update
[Applause]
